text: Geneviève Levy Geneviève Levy (born February 24, 1948 in Marseille) is a member of the National Assembly of France. She represents the Var department, and is a member of the Republicans. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Marseille Category:French Jews Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:The Social Right Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 15th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Geneviève Levy
